goal.tools.codeanalysis

Class CodeAnalysisOverview

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.tools.codeanalysis.CodeAnalysisOverview

  • public class CodeAnalysisOverview
extends java.lang.Object
    Produces a string of text summarizing code analysis results. The option 'verbose' can be checked in which case all text labels are included, or, if unchecked all text labels are excluded.
    Author:
    W.Pasman

    • Constructor Summary

        public java.lang.String getText(boolean brief,
                       boolean verbose)
        Get the overview in text form.
        Parameters:

        verbose - true to get also the labels.

        the overview text.

        Add a label and a double to the overview.
        Parameters:
        label - a label that indicates the meaning of the value.
        value - a double that represents e.g. a statistical average.

      • add

        Add a label and an integer to the overview.

        value - an integer that represents an occurrence count.
